nodes.bodyText: It is not the deck options page that opens though is it? It is more like a deck information page
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -195,4 +195,5 @@
     <string name="deck_picker_new">Number of new cards to see today in this deck.</string>
     <string name="deck_picker_rev">Number of cards due today in this deck.</string>
     <string name="deck_picker_lrn">Number of cards in learning in this deck.</string> <!-- This is as simplification. It depends on sched v1 1 or 2, may count repetition but only cards due now are counted-->
